contact_points.description: At the end of the wrench handle (lever arm)
contact_points.usage: Grasp point for lever action. Held here to maximize torque around the functional axis.

functional_points.usage: Radial interaction point. Requires pure rotation (Ï‰_y) around the bolt axis. Does NOT require axial push (v_y). Focus on maintaining lateral contact with the bolt flats. when it approaches the object(like bolt) using z dir of funcional matrix
